Directory structure

This section will focus on the description of the file directory of the Stetson server and the presentation of the principals folders used in the execution of GEOS-Chem.

Home Directory

/stetson-home/username/

Home folder where you are greated when logging on Stetson.

Storage directory

/data{1-12}/username/

Personnal storage space where you can store data, model source code, etc.

/data10/ctm/

GEOS-Chem input files storage location

/data1/carlin/for_phillipe

Storage folder of exemple of post-process scripts for GEOS-Chem TOMAS

Transfert directory

/scratch-space/globus/username/

Endpoint access to Stetson to be used to transfert to and from the server

Packages directory

/software/share/

Location of packages collections.
